product.text:
Lilo & Stitch

In this delightful novelization of Disney’s animated film, a lonely Hawaiian girl named Lilo is ostracized by her peers for being different, and is desperate for a friend. One day, when Lilo sees a falling star, she wishes for a friend. Unbeknownst to Lilo, the falling star is actually a spaceship piloted by an escaped, quirky alien named Stitch. Lilo adopts Stitch as a pet, and the two embark on a journey of acceptance, forging an unlikely yet powerful friendship.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child what she can do to make another girl or boy feel welcome and included Often children may not know what to say to a new child in a group setting. Help your child by encouraging her to say, “Hi. My name is _____. Do you want to play?” to the new child. You’ll be surprised how a simple ice-breaker will help your child to make new friends.
